Package Entity.chance

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChanceCard  
    GoToJail_Card
    Moves a player to jail
    JailFree_Card
    Gives a Free-card to escape from jail, when it is your turn again
    MatadorLegat_Card
    Gives a matadorlegat card, which gives 40000kr to the player, if he his money <15000kr.
    Money_Card
    Cardtype that gives a certain amount of cash to a person's balance, dependant on the message on the card.
    Move_Card
    Moves a player to a specific square
    MoveBackwards_Card
    Moves player 3 fields backwards
    MoveForwards_Card
    Moves player 3 steps forward
    MoveToShip_Card
    Method to send player to the nearest ship, and pay double rent of current if it is owned by a player, which isn't the player that landed on it.
    PayPropertyTax_Card
    Method to get tax payment for every house and hotel owned in the game.
    ReceiveMoneyFromAll_Card
    Receive money from all players in the game.
